member.name: T:Windows.Media.Capture.CameraOptionsUI
member.summary: Provides a method for displaying a UI, by which the UI contains options for the capture of photos, audio recordings and videos.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Capture.CameraOptionsUI.Show(Windows.Media.Capture.MediaCapture)
member.summary: Displays a UI that contains options for the capture of photos, audio recordings and videos.
member.param: The MediaCapture object that provides methods for the capture of photos, audio recordings and videos.
